snippet: In the latest quarter, the company earned $1.10 per share, missing analysts’ $1.16 consensus. But the stock shot up after executives’s comments....
lead_paragraph: In the latest quarter, the company earned $1.10 per share, missing analysts’ $1.16 consensus. But the stock shot up after executives’s comments.

headline.main: Disney Promises Growth, and Shares Rise in After-Hours Trading
headline.print_headline: Disney Vows New Growth, and Its Shares Shoot Up
